artist: Designer: Sudō Reiko; Manufacturer: Nuno Corporation
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons and Rosa Lynn Pinkus
medium: Cotton, wool, polyurethane, jacquard double weave
text: With the inclusion of an elastic thread in the construction of the double woven fabric the irregular, independent 'pockets' created by the designer were allowed to collapse. The inspiration that motivated these weaving experiments was the desire to recreate the texture of dried vanilla beans.
title: Vanilla
